name: The Sailor’s Dream
summary: A peaceful narrative experience, in which the only objective is to satisfy your curiosity. Explore an ocean dream world, in which time passes even when you are not there, visit forgotten islands and piece together memories – some even existing beyond the screen of your device.
info:
• 中文名: 水手之梦
  • 开发: Simogo
  • 发行: Simogo
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014-11-6
  • 售价: $3.99
